name: Rosefury: The Golden Plains
description:
Rosefury: The Golden Plains is a trichromatic roguelike-like-like platformer that tells a story about love, hate, and everything in between.

Join Venice and his friends as they embark on an epic adventure across the Golden Plains, a brand new world filled with enemies, allies, hazards, and more!

Do you think you have what it takes to leave every square inch of this world untouched? What will you find on your adventures? How far will your luck take you? Who will live? Who will die? I leave that up to you. I'll be waiting.
